.. index:: RegularChain

.. _l526567756c6172436861696e:

RegularChain(R, ls)
===================

:viewcode:`zerodim.spad line 79 <zerodim.spad#L79>` :editcode:`[edit on github] <zerodim.spad#L79>`

* R: \ :ref:`GcdDomain <l476364446f6d61696e>`\ 

* ls: \ :ref:`List <l4c697374>`\  \ :ref:`Symbol <l53796d626f6c>`\ 


A domain for regular chains (i.e. regular triangular sets) over a \ ``Gcd``\ -Domain and with a fix list of variables. This is just a front-end for the \ :ref:`RegularTriangularSet <l526567756c6172547269616e67756c6172536574>`\  domain constructor.


.. _l526567756c6172436861696e-23:

\ :ref:`# <l416767726567617465-23>`\ \: % -> \ :ref:`NonNegativeInteger <l4e6f6e4e65676174697665496e7465676572>`\  
  from \ :ref:`Aggregate <l416767726567617465>`\

  from \ :ref:`BasicType <l426173696354797065>`\

  from \ :ref:`BasicType <l426173696354797065>`\

  from \ :ref:`RegularTriangularSetCategory <l526567756c6172547269616e67756c617253657443617465676f7279>`\ (R, \ :ref:`IndexedExponents <l496e64657865644578706f6e656e7473>`\  \ :ref:`OrderedVariableList <l4f7264657265645661726961626c654c697374>`\  ls, \ :ref:`OrderedVariableList <l4f7264657265645661726961626c654c697374>`\  ls, \ :ref:`NewSparseMultivariatePolynomial <l4e65775370617273654d756c746976617269617465506f6c796e6f6d69616c>`\ (R, \ :ref:`OrderedVariableList <l4f7264657265645661726961626c654c697374>`\  ls))

  from \ :ref:`PolynomialSetCategory <l506f6c796e6f6d69616c53657443617465676f7279>`\ (R, \ :ref:`IndexedExponents <l496e64657865644578706f6e656e7473>`\  \ :ref:`OrderedVariableList <l4f7264657265645661726961626c654c697374>`\  ls, \ :ref:`OrderedVariableList <l4f7264657265645661726961626c654c697374>`\  ls, \ :ref:`NewSparseMultivariatePolynomial <l4e65775370617273654d756c746976617269617465506f6c796e6f6d69616c>`\ (R, \ :ref:`OrderedVariableList <l4f7264657265645661726961626c654c697374>`\  ls))

.. _l526567756c6172436861696e-7a65726f53657453706c6974:

\ :ref:`zeroSetSplit <l526567756c6172547269616e67756c617253657443617465676f7279-7a65726f53657453706c6974>`\ \: (\ :ref:`List <l4c697374>`\  \ :ref:`NewSparseMultivariatePolynomial <l4e65775370617273654d756c746976617269617465506f6c796e6f6d69616c>`\ (R, \ :ref:`OrderedVariableList <l4f7264657265645661726961626c654c697374>`\  ls), \ :ref:`Boolean <l426f6f6c65616e>`\ ) -> \ :ref:`List <l4c697374>`\  % 
  from \ :ref:`RegularTriangularSetCategory <l526567756c6172547269616e67756c617253657443617465676f7279>`\ (R, \ :ref:`IndexedExponents <l496e64657865644578706f6e656e7473>`\  \ :ref:`OrderedVariableList <l4f7264657265645661726961626c654c697374>`\  ls, \ :ref:`OrderedVariableList <l4f7264657265645661726961626c654c697374>`\  ls, \ :ref:`NewSparseMultivariatePolynomial <l4e65775370617273654d756c746976617269617465506f6c796e6f6d69616c>`\ (R, \ :ref:`OrderedVariableList <l4f7264657265645661726961626c654c697374>`\  ls))


.. index::
   pair: RegularChain; zeroSetSplit

:spadfun:`zeroSetSplit`\: (\ :ref:`List <l4c697374>`\  \ :ref:`NewSparseMultivariatePolynomial <l4e65775370617273654d756c746976617269617465506f6c796e6f6d69616c>`\ (R, \ :ref:`OrderedVariableList <l4f7264657265645661726961626c654c697374>`\  ls), \ :ref:`Boolean <l426f6f6c65616e>`\ , \ :ref:`Boolean <l426f6f6c65616e>`\ ) -> \ :ref:`List <l4c697374>`\  % 
  \ ``zeroSetSplit(lp, clos?, info?)``\  returns a list \ ``lts``\  of regular chains such that the union of the closures of their regular zero sets equals the affine variety associated with \ ``lp``\ . Moreover, if \ ``clos?``\  is \ ``false``\  then the union of the regular zero set of the \ ``ts``\  (for \ ``ts``\  in \ ``lts``\ ) equals this variety. If \ ``info?``\  is \ ``true``\  then some information is displayed during the computations. See \ :ref:`zeroSetSplit <l526567756c6172547269616e67756c6172536574-7a65726f53657453706c6974>`\ .


\ :ref:`zeroSetSplit <l547269616e67756c617253657443617465676f7279-7a65726f53657453706c6974>`\ \: \ :ref:`List <l4c697374>`\  \ :ref:`NewSparseMultivariatePolynomial <l4e65775370617273654d756c746976617269617465506f6c796e6f6d69616c>`\ (R, \ :ref:`OrderedVariableList <l4f7264657265645661726961626c654c697374>`\  ls) -> \ :ref:`List <l4c697374>`\  % 
  from \ :ref:`TriangularSetCategory <l547269616e67756c617253657443617465676f7279>`\ (R, \ :ref:`IndexedExponents <l496e64657865644578706f6e656e7473>`\  \ :ref:`OrderedVariableList <l4f7264657265645661726961626c654c697374>`\  ls, \ :ref:`OrderedVariableList <l4f7264657265645661726961626c654c697374>`\  ls, \ :ref:`NewSparseMultivariatePolynomial <l4e65775370617273654d756c746976617269617465506f6c796e6f6d69616c>`\ (R, \ :ref:`OrderedVariableList <l4f7264657265645661726961626c654c697374>`\  ls))

\ :ref:`zeroSetSplitIntoTriangularSystems <l547269616e67756c617253657443617465676f7279-7a65726f53657453706c6974496e746f547269616e67756c617253797374656d73>`\ \: \ :ref:`List <l4c697374>`\  \ :ref:`NewSparseMultivariatePolynomial <l4e65775370617273654d756c746976617269617465506f6c796e6f6d69616c>`\ (R, \ :ref:`OrderedVariableList <l4f7264657265645661726961626c654c697374>`\  ls) -> \ :ref:`List <l4c697374>`\  Record(close: %, open: \ :ref:`List <l4c697374>`\  \ :ref:`NewSparseMultivariatePolynomial <l4e65775370617273654d756c746976617269617465506f6c796e6f6d69616c>`\ (R, \ :ref:`OrderedVariableList <l4f7264657265645661726961626c654c697374>`\  ls))
